overview: This movie is an hour and a half of all kinds of sex. It starts with a foursome that begins as two separate couples. Before long, however, they merge and switch it up together. There is a very hot shower scene that takes place in front of the king. There is also one brief lesbian scene. The rest of the movie is a threesome followed by straight sex with a rather young looking couple.
tagline: The erotic experiences of a young housemaid.
title: Sex Tales from 2002 Arabian Nights
